page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT
page.content: WORK SURVEY _ 15 dads work in Whitwell. _ 66 dads work out of Whitwell. _ 27 mums work in Whitwell. _ 29 mums work out of Whitwell. _ 25 mums are housewives. {These are some of the jobs dads do in {Whitwell: _ Builders _ Farmer _ Landscape Gardener {Out of Whitwell: _ Engineering _ Advertising _ Planning director for Roadline _ Security Guard _ Estate Agent _ Banker _ Wine Merchant {Mum's jobs in Whitwell: _ Cleaning _ Playgroup _ Writer _ Shop Assistant _ Hair Dresser {Out of Whitwell: _ Weight Watching Instructor _ Teaching _ Magistrate _ Looking After Old People
